dishes.name: White Sauce Pasta (Penne/Macaroni)
dishes.description: Indulge in our creamy White Sauce Pasta, where perfectly al dente penne or macaroni is enveloped in a rich, velvety béchamel sauce infused with aromatic herbs. Finished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley and grated parmesan cheese for an authentic Italian experience.

dishes.name: Red Sauce Pasta (Penne/Macaroni)
dishes.description: Savor our classic Red Sauce Pasta, featuring al dente penne or macaroni tossed in a vibrant, slow-simmered tomato sauce with garlic, basil, and a hint of chili for a subtle kick.

dishes.name: Pink Sauce Pasta (Penne/Macaroni)
dishes.description: Experience the best of both worlds with our Pink Sauce Pasta, a harmonious blend of creamy white sauce and tangy tomato sauce, creating a luscious rose-colored sauce that clings to every piece of pasta.

dishes.name: Stuffed Capsicum
dishes.description: Delight in our Stuffed Capsicum, where tender bell peppers are filled with a savory mixture of seasoned pasta, vegetables, and cheese, then baked to perfection.

dishes.name: Alfredo Pasta
dishes.description: Indulge in our rich and creamy Alfredo Pasta, where fettuccine is coated in a luxurious sauce made from butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese, garnished with fresh parsley.

dishes.name: Lasagna
dishes.description: Layers of pasta sheets, rich tomato sauce, creamy béchamel, and a blend of cheeses, baked to golden perfection. Our Lasagna is a hearty and comforting dish that will transport you to Italy.

dishes.name: Pesto Penne
dishes.description: Tossed in a vibrant green pesto sauce made from fresh basil, pine nuts, garlic, and Parmesan cheese, our Pesto Penne is a burst of herbaceous flavor in every bite.

dishes.name: Veggie a La King
dishes.description: Our Veggie a La King features a medley of vegetables in a creamy, savory sauce, served over your choice of pasta.

dishes.name: Baked Macaroni
dishes.description: A comforting classic, our Baked Macaroni is smothered in a rich cheese sauce and baked until bubbly and golden brown, with a crispy breadcrumb topping for added texture.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.description: A classic Italian pizza with a thin, crispy crust, topped with our signature tomato sauce, fresh buffalo mozzarella, and fragrant basil leaves. Drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and baked to perfection in our stone oven for authentic flavor.

dishes.name: Veg Pizza
dishes.description: Our Veg Pizza is loaded with a colorful array of fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and olives, all atop a bed of melted mozzarella and our house-made tomato sauce.

dishes.name: Cheese Tomato Pizza
dishes.description: Featuring juicy tomato slices and a blend of cheeses on our signature crust, this pizza celebrates the classic pairing of cheese and tomatoes.

dishes.name: Cheese Corn Pizza
dishes.description: Sweet corn kernels and stretchy mozzarella cheese come together on this delightful pizza, offering a perfect balance of sweetness and savoriness.

dishes.name: Paneer Pizza
dishes.description: Soft cubes of paneer marinated in spices, combined with onions, bell peppers, and cheese, creating a fusion of Indian and Italian flavors.

dishes.name: Cheese Burst Pizza
dishes.description: Indulge in our Cheese Burst Pizza, where a layer of creamy cheese is hidden within the crust, oozing with every bite, topped with your favorite vegetables and more cheese.

dishes.name: Tandoori Pizza
dishes.description: A unique blend of tandoori spices and classic pizza, featuring tandoori-marinated vegetables or paneer, with a spicy kick.

dishes.name: Baeleaf's Special Pizza
dishes.description: Our chef's signature creation, featuring a secret blend of toppings and sauces that will surprise and delight your taste buds.

dishes.name: Fried Rice
dishes.description: A staple of Chinese cuisine, our Fried Rice is wok-tossed with vegetables, soy sauce, and aromatic spices, delivering a perfect balance of flavors.

dishes.name: Manchurian with Fried Rice
dishes.description: Crispy vegetable balls in a tangy Manchurian sauce, served alongside our classic Fried Rice for a complete meal.

dishes.name: Singapore Fried Rice
dishes.description: A flavorful twist on traditional fried rice, infused with curry powder and mixed with vegetables, offering a taste of Singapore's street food.

dishes.name: Noodles
dishes.description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables and soy sauce, simple yet satisfying.

dishes.name: Veg Chow Mein
dishes.description: Thin noodles stir-fried with shredded vegetables in a savory sauce.

dishes.name: Hakka Noodles
dishes.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish, featuring noodles tossed with vegetables and a hint of spice.

dishes.name: American Chop Suey
dishes.description: Crispy fried noodles topped with a sweet and tangy sauce and vegetables, an Indo-Chinese favorite.

dishes.name: Singapore Noodles
dishes.description: Rice vermicelli stir-fried with curry powder, vegetables, and sometimes tofu, inspired by Singaporean cuisine.

dishes.name: Manchurian
dishes.description: Vegetable dumplings in a spicy, garlicky sauce, a beloved Indo-Chinese appetizer.

dishes.name: Chinese Bhel
dishes.description: A fusion snack where crispy noodles are mixed with vegetables and tangy sauces, perfect for a quick bite.

dishes.name: Honey Chilly Potato
dishes.description: Crispy potato fingers tossed in a sweet and spicy honey chili sauce, a delightful starter.

dishes.name: Gobhi Chilly Potato
dishes.description: Crispy cauliflower and potato tossed in a spicy chili sauce, a flavorful combination.

dishes.name: Schezwan Noodle
dishes.description: Noodles stir-fried with Schezwan sauce, known for its bold and spicy flavor.

dishes.name: Chilly Paneer
dishes.description: Paneer cubes sautéed with bell peppers and onions in a spicy chili sauce.

dishes.name: Paneer 65
dishes.description: Spicy and tangy paneer dish, marinated and fried, then tossed with curry leaves and spices.

dishes.name: Noodle with Manchurian
dishes.description: A combination of stir-fried noodles and vegetable Manchurian, offering the best of both worlds.

dishes.name: Plain Masala Magge
dishes.description: The classic instant noodles cooked with the signature masala spice mix, a comfort food favorite.

dishes.name: Double Masala Maggi
dishes.description: Twice the flavor with extra masala, for those who love their Maggie extra spicy.

dishes.name: Cheese Maggi
dishes.description: Creamy and cheesy, this Maggie is topped with melted cheese for added richness.

dishes.name: Vegetable Maggi
dishes.description: Loaded with fresh vegetables like carrots, peas, and bell peppers, making it more nutritious and colorful.

dishes.name: Paneer Maggi
dishes.description: Soft paneer cubes added to the noodles, providing a protein boost and extra texture.

dishes.name: Tandoori Maggi
dishes.description: Infused with tandoori spices, giving the noodles a smoky and aromatic flavor.

dishes.name: Cheese Corn Maggi
dishes.description: A delightful combination of sweet corn and melted cheese in every bite.

dishes.name: Punjabi Tadka Maggi
dishes.description: Spiced with Punjabi flavors, featuring a tempering of cumin, onions, and tomatoes.

dishes.name: Bombay Sandwich
dishes.description: A street food classic from Mumbai, featuring layers of vegetables, chutney, and spices between slices of bread.

dishes.name: Veg Grilled Sandwich
dishes.description: Grilled to perfection, this sandwich is packed with fresh vegetables and cheese, with a crispy exterior.

dishes.name: Cheese Chutney Sandwich
dishes.description: A simple yet flavorful sandwich with a spread of green chutney and generous cheese.

dishes.name: Cheese Corn Sandwich
dishes.description: Sweet corn and cheese make for a delightful filling in this grilled sandwich.

dishes.name: Tandoori Sandwich
dishes.description: Filled with tandoori-spiced vegetables or paneer, offering a smoky and spicy twist.

dishes.name: Paneer Sandwich
dishes.description: Soft paneer slices with vegetables and spices, grilled to perfection.

dishes.name: Club Sandwich
dishes.description: A triple-decker sandwich with layers of vegetables, cheese, and special sauces, served with chips.

dishes.name: Baeleaf's Special Sandwich
dishes.description: Our signature sandwich with a unique combination of ingredients, crafted by our chef.

dishes.name: Chef Styled Sandwich
dishes.description: A creative sandwich designed by our chef, featuring premium ingredients and flavors.

dishes.name: Aloo Tikki Burger
dishes.description: A crispy potato patty with Indian spices, served in a bun with lettuce, tomato, and sauce. Add cheese for ₹20 extra.

dishes.name: Veg Tikki Burger
dishes.description: A vegetable patty made with mixed vegetables and spices, offering a hearty bite. Add cheese for ₹20 extra.

dishes.name: Paneer Burger
dishes.description: A grilled paneer patty with tandoori marinade, topped with onions and mint chutney. Add cheese for ₹20 extra.

dishes.name: Tandoori Burger
dishes.description: Featuring a tandoori-spiced patty, either vegetable or paneer, with a smoky flavor. Add cheese for ₹20 extra.

dishes.name: Chocolate Sizzlers
dishes.description: A decadent dessert sizzler featuring warm chocolate brownie or cake, served on a hot plate with ice cream and chocolate sauce, creating a dramatic presentation.

dishes.name: Chinese Sizzlers
dishes.description: A sizzling platter of Chinese-inspired dishes, including noodles, rice, and Manchurian, served with a variety of sauces.

dishes.name: Italian Sizzlers
dishes.description: An Italian twist on the sizzler, featuring pasta, garlic bread, and grilled vegetables, all served on a hot plate.

dishes.name: Plain Chai
dishes.description: A simple yet comforting cup of Indian tea, brewed with milk and sugar.

dishes.name: Adrak Chai
dishes.description: Ginger-infused tea, perfect for a soothing and warming experience.

dishes.name: Elaichi Chai
dishes.description: Cardamom-flavored tea, aromatic and refreshing.

dishes.name: Masala Chai
dishes.description: A blend of spices like cinnamon, cloves, and cardamom in your tea, for a rich and flavorful drink.

dishes.name: Mangal Chai
dishes.description: Our unique Mangal Chai, with a secret mix of spices for a delightful taste.

dishes.name: Saffron Chai
dishes.description: Luxurious tea infused with saffron strands, offering a royal experience.

dishes.name: Hot Lemon Honey Ginger
dishes.description: A soothing drink with lemon, honey, and ginger, perfect for relaxation.

dishes.name: Lemon Tea
dishes.description: Black tea with a squeeze of lemon, refreshing and tangy.

dishes.name: Mint Tea
dishes.description: Fresh mint leaves steeped in hot water, a cooling and aromatic beverage.

dishes.name: Indian Espresso
dishes.description: A bold and intense coffee shot, inspired by Indian brewing methods.

dishes.name: Cappuccino
dishes.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam, a classic Italian coffee.

dishes.name: Latte
dishes.description: Espresso with steamed milk, smooth and creamy.

dishes.name: Special Coffee
dishes.description: Our chef's special coffee creation, with unique flavors and presentation.

dishes.name: Blue Heaven
dishes.description: A vibrant blue mojito with a mysterious and delightful flavor profile.

dishes.name: Bubblegum
dishes.description: A fun and playful mojito with the sweet taste of bubblegum.

dishes.name: Mint
dishes.description: A refreshing mint mojito, perfect for cooling down.

dishes.name: Strawberry Fizz
dishes.description: A fizzy mojito with fresh strawberry puree, sweet and tangy.

dishes.name: Green Apple
dishes.description: Crisp and tart green apple flavor in a refreshing mojito.

dishes.name: Raspberry Mojito
dishes.description: Tangy raspberry combined with mint and lime for a fruity twist.

dishes.name: Watermelon
dishes.description: Juicy watermelon mojito, perfect for summer.

dishes.name: Virgin Mojito
dishes.description: The classic non-alcoholic mojito with mint, lime, sugar, and soda water.

dishes.name: Vanilla Shake
dishes.description: A creamy and smooth vanilla milkshake, made with real vanilla beans.

dishes.name: Chocolate Shake
dishes.description: Rich and indulgent chocolate shake, perfect for chocolate lovers.

dishes.name: Chocolate Shake with Ice Cream
dishes.description: Our chocolate shake topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for extra decadence.

dishes.name: Mango Shake
dishes.description: Seasonal mangoes blended into a thick and fruity shake.

dishes.name: Oreo Shake
dishes.description: Cookies and cream in a shake, with crushed Oreos mixed in.

dishes.name: Kitkat Shake
dishes.description: Chocolatey Kitkat pieces blended into a milkshake, with a crunchy surprise.

dishes.name: Sitafal Shake
dishes.description: Custard apple (sitafal) pulp blended into a unique and flavorful shake.

dishes.name: Strawberry Shake
dishes.description: Fresh strawberries make this shake sweet and refreshing.

dishes.name: Papita Shake
dishes.description: Papaya shake, creamy and tropical.

dishes.name: Chiku Shake
dishes.description: Sapodilla fruit (chiku) blended into a sweet and exotic shake.

dishes.name: Chia Seeds Shake
dishes.description: A healthy twist with chia seeds added to your choice of shake, providing extra nutrition.

dishes.name: Cold Coffee
dishes.description: Chilled coffee blended with milk and sugar, a refreshing pick-me-up.

dishes.name: Cold Coffee with Brownie
dishes.description: Our cold coffee served with a piece of chocolate brownie on the side.

dishes.name: Cold Coffee with Ice Cream
dishes.description: Cold coffee topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, creamy and delicious.

dishes.name: Gulkand Cold Coffee
dishes.description: A unique twist with the addition of gulkand (rose petal jam), adding a floral note to your cold coffee.

dishes.name: Vanilla Frappe
dishes.description: A blended ice coffee drink with vanilla flavor, topped with whipped cream.

dishes.name: Caramel Frappe
dishes.description: Sweet caramel syrup blended into a frappe, with a drizzle of caramel on top.

dishes.name: Hazelnut Frappe
dishes.description: Nutty hazelnut flavor in a chilled frappe, perfect for nut lovers.

dishes.name: Irish Frappe
dishes.description: A frappe with the flavors of Irish cream, rich and indulgent.

dishes.name: Maska Bun
dishes.description: A soft bun slathered with butter, a simple yet satisfying snack.

dishes.name: Salted French Fries
dishes.description: Classic crispy fries with a sprinkle of salt.

dishes.name: Masala French Fries
dishes.description: Fries tossed in Indian spices for an extra kick.

dishes.name: Peri Peri French Fries
dishes.description: Spicy peri peri seasoning on crispy fries.

dishes.name: Tandoori French Fries
dishes.description: Fries marinated in tandoori spices, offering a unique flavor.

dishes.name: Cheese Garlic Toast
dishes.description: Toasted bread with garlic butter and melted cheese.

dishes.name: Cheese Balls
dishes.description: Deep-fried balls of cheese, crispy on the outside, gooey inside.

dishes.name: Cheese Meshed Potatoes
dishes.description: Creamy mashed potatoes topped with melted cheese.

dishes.name: Kaathi Rolls
dishes.description: Indian-style wraps with vegetables or paneer, spices, and chutney.

dishes.name: Crispy Corn
dishes.description: Fried corn kernels tossed in spices, a crunchy snack.
